snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan expects to play a leading role in a Romney administration’s drive to enact a budget-shrinking government and overhauling programs like Medicare.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan has largely disappeared from national spotlight in campaign homestretch, ceding attention to Mitt Romney, but if Republican ticket wins he plans to establish an activist vice presidency; expects to play leading role in Romney administration’s drive to enact budget-shrinking government and overhauling programs like Medicare.

byline.contributor: Mark Leibovich contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan expects to play a leading role in a Romney administration’s drive to enact a budget-shrinking government and overhauling programs like Medicare.

headline.seo: Paul Ryan Is Said to be Planning an Active Role
headline.main: Ryan, Quiet for Now, Is Said to Be Planning for an Active Role
headline.print_headline: Ryan, Quiet for Now, Is Said to Be Planning for an Active Role
